channel.title: CasualRP Podcast
channel.description: A Boy, Guard, Thief and Giant are caught between the wild cries of the jungle and the hammers of industry… this is Casual RP. A 5th edition Dungeons and Dragons Actual Play Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Redhead Web
channel.itunes:summary: Twice-weekly actual play DnD podcast done by complete amateurs. We have a gritty and realistic medieval setting to explore where the plot and quests are shaped by the players and listeners.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Boy, Guard, Thief and Giant are caught between the wild cries of the jungle and the hammers of industry… this is Casual RP. A 5th edition Dungeons and Dragons Actual Play Podcast

item.title: 8 - Choosing Your Own Path
item.description: Attack! Furious and vicious small humanoids in masks leap from the jungle to attack the party. In the chaos, some of the prisoners make a run for freedom. But after the night&rsquo;s battle, the party makes it to the seaside town of New Forlonde at last.
item.itunes:summary: Attack! Furious and vicious small humanoids in masks leap from the jungle to attack the party. In the chaos, some of the prisoners make a run for freedom. But after the night&rsquo;s battle, the party makes it to the seaside town of New Forlonde at last.

item.title: 7 - Disciples of The Raven Queen
item.description: The party finds themselves caught in the middle of someone else&rsquo;s battle. Some humans with terrible fashion sense are being pursued by brightly coloured frog-people. The humans seek refuge with the party while the frog people attack indiscriminately. Cor however near the end of the fight decides to take the humans prisoner and the party then tries to figure out what to do with them.
item.itunes:summary: The party finds themselves caught in the middle of someone else&rsquo;s battle. Some humans with terrible fashion sense are being pursued by brightly coloured frog-people. The humans seek refuge with the party while the frog people attack indiscriminately. Cor however near the end of the fight decides to take the humans prisoner and the party then tries to figure out what to do with them.

item.title: 6 - Scars Are Just Another Kind of Memory
item.description: The party passes near a magical tree bearing glowing Wucca nuts. Excited, the party climbs the tree and disturbs it&rsquo;s inhabitants. The gold colored drop bears attack viciously and have some bizarre magical qualities. When the party camps to recover near a stream, a strange tri-flowered crawling plant approaches whose scent proves very alluring.
item.itunes:summary: The party passes near a magical tree bearing glowing Wucca nuts. Excited, the party climbs the tree and disturbs it&rsquo;s inhabitants. The gold colored drop bears attack viciously and have some bizarre magical qualities. When the party camps to recover near a stream, a strange tri-flowered crawling plant approaches whose scent proves very alluring.

item.title: 5 - This Jungle Is Nuts
item.description: Leila claims to not be human. Ser Selwyn doesn&rsquo;t believe her. They visit a Craftsmen signal tower manned by the small Ganus family and meet the newest member little Letha. Ash, Ser Selwyn and Leila ask Penelope Ganus about the walking dead they saw and she provides some troubling information.
item.itunes:summary: Leila claims to not be human. Ser Selwyn doesn&rsquo;t believe her. They visit a Craftsmen signal tower manned by the small Ganus family and meet the newest member little Letha. Ash, Ser Selwyn and Leila ask Penelope Ganus about the walking dead they saw and she provides some troubling information.

item.title: 3 - The Aftermath
item.description: After the bar fight, Ser Selwyn talks to the guard about what to do with the Blackheart Orcs. Meanwhile Leila&rsquo;s friends give her some advice on how to politically manage the situation. Ser Selwyn then goes over the details of the plan to retrieve the settlers with his superiors. They rest and rise extra early to depart Shinrin for the wild trails of the jungle.
item.itunes:summary: After the bar fight, Ser Selwyn talks to the guard about what to do with the Blackheart Orcs. Meanwhile Leila&rsquo;s friends give her some advice on how to politically manage the situation. Ser Selwyn then goes over the details of the plan to retrieve the settlers with his superiors. They rest and rise extra early to depart Shinrin for the wild trails of the jungle.

item.title: 2 - Enter the Blackhearts
item.description: Selwyn &amp; Leila take a trip to the Kronus&rsquo;s farm to try to convince the widow there to let her son join the Craftsmen. Meanwhile Ash takes Cor to a shrine to show him the deities of Shinrin. Cor isn&rsquo;t much impressed. That evening, Leila&rsquo;s friends are keen to meet Cor, for some reason, while Ash brags about becoming a Craftsman to the other guards. Their evening is interrupted by a gang of orcs called the Blackhearts looking for a fight.
item.itunes:summary: Selwyn &amp; Leila take a trip to the Kronus&rsquo;s farm to try to convince the widow there to let her son join the Craftsmen. Meanwhile Ash takes Cor to a shrine to show him the deities of Shinrin. Cor isn&rsquo;t much impressed. That evening, Leila&rsquo;s friends are keen to meet Cor, for some reason, while Ash brags about becoming a Craftsman to the other guards. Their evening is interrupted by a gang of orcs called the Blackhearts looking for a fight.

item.title: 1 - A Replacement Craftsman
item.description: After their tiger hunting trip, the party spends the evening dining with Lord Jacku and Lady Jiru Shinrin. The next morning they enjoy bacon in the servant&rsquo;s kitchen before slipping out and splitting up to do town jobs. Ser Selwyn &amp; Leila visit Ser Thomas while Cor &amp; Ash go shopping for supplies with their new-found wealth. They learn about a job escorting new settlers to Shinrin and decide to take it.
